title: Bloomberg Markets: Rosenblum on What Makes a Passion Brand

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jeff Rosenblum Founder Questus Discussing his book "Friction: Passion Brands in the Age of Disruption."
